name: Fortune Favours the Bold
description:
CONTROLS: 

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to Dash
  • Left click to shoot

First gamejam game i've ever done, in 3 hours with TriJam! It was very fun and it feels good to actually finish a game for once, and release it.

The theme was "Game based on a quote" and I chose the quote: "Fortune favours the bold." - Virgil, and the way how it plays into my game is that you gain extra points by having "close calls", which favours the bold by going near the enemys and dashing away to avoid their dashes against you!
